item.title: To be, or not to be: Code Comments
item.description: There are a lot of good discussions around whether we should add comments in our code or not. Please go through below links to read more: https://blog.codinghorror.com/coding-without-comments/ https://softwareengineering.stackexchange.com/questions/1/comments-are-a-code-smell
